mapper.select: SELECT work_order_no FROM work_orders WHERE work_order_no LIKE CONCAT('WO-', #{date}, '-%') ORDER BY work_order_no DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM work_orders ORDER BY work_order_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO work_orders ( work_order_no, plan_id, work_plan_no, work_start_date, work_quantity, work_status, work_remark, work_created_by, rml_no, w_code, w_name, p_name ) VALUES ( #{workOrderNo}, #{planId}, #{workPlanNo}, #{workStartDate}, #{workQuantity}, #{workStatus}, #{workRemark}, #{workCreatedBy}, #{rmlNo}, #{wCode}, #{wName}, #{pName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE work_orders SET work_status = #{workStatus}, workStartTime = #{workStartTime}, workEndTime = #{workEndTime}, completedQuantity = #{completedQuantity} WHERE work_id = #{workId}
mapper.select: SELECT bom_id, rm_code, bom_name, bom_ratio, bom_description FROM bill_of_materials WHERE bom_id = #{bomId}
SELECT bom.rm_code FROM work_orders wo JOIN products p ON wo.p_name = p.p_name JOIN bill_of_materials bom ON p.bom_id = bom.bom_id WHERE wo.work_id = #{workId}
SELECT sm.sm_bno, sm.sm_total, sm.rml_no, sm.rml_date FROM stock_materials sm WHERE sm.rm_code = #{rmCode} AND sm.sm_total > 0 ORDER BY sm.rml_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lot_history ( work_id, rml_no, quantity_used, usage_date ) VALUES ( #{workId}, #{rmlNo}, #{quantityUsed}, NOW() )
